greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dirichlet convolution of r with zeta, where r(n) = (-1)^Omega(n) if n is 1 or not a perfect power and r(n) = 0 otherwise.
comment: Omega(n) = A001222(n) is the number of prime factors of n counted with multiplicity.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d = 1 or not a perfect power} (-1)^Omega(d).
xref: Positions of nonzero entries appear to be A126706.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 19 2018
